thread.title: 13 die as Russia strike hits Syria field hospital
thread.title_full: 13 die as Russia strike hits Syria field hospital | News24

author: news24.com
title: 13 die as Russia strike hits Syria field hospital
text:
Beirut - At least 13 people, including medical staff, were killed when Russian warplanes struck a field hospital in northwestern Syria, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights said on Wednesday.
The observatory's Rami Abdel Rahman said: "The Russian air strike hit a field clinic in the town of Sarmin, including a physiotherapist, a guard and a civil defence member."
Sarmin lies in the northwestern province of Idlib, which has been regularly targeted by Russia's military since the beginning of its air war in Syria on September 30.
The clinic was run by the Syrian-American medical society, whose staff confirmed that strikes had "severely damaged" the facility.
